mapper.sql: sd.dept_id, sd.dept_code, sd.dept_name, sd.dept_desc, sd.factory_id, sd.parent_id, sd.`status`, sd.remark, sd.organization_id, sd.create_user_id, sd.create_time, sd.modified_user_id, sd.modified_time, sd.is_delete, sd.option1, sd.option2, sd.option3
mapper.select: select , sf.factory_name, u.user_name as createUserName, s.user_name as modifiedUserName from fantech_imes.smt_dept sd left join ocean.sys_user u on sd.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on sd.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes.smt_factory sf on sd.factory_id=sf.factory_id where sd.parent_id=#{parentId}
